external_games.name: L'Odyssée Sibérienne: Le Rêve Utile de Nicolas Vanier

name: L'Odyssée Sibérienne: Le Rêve Utile de Nicolas Vanier
storyline: The game follow the siberian odyssee of Nicolas Vanier. You have to go from lake Baïkal to Moscow by dogsled. You need to take care of your dogs, your sled and yourself while finding the best route. And you can also take pictures of also the wild animals you encounter on the road !
summary: A french game about Nicolas Vanier siberian odyssee
